content: one of the students in my weekly knitting class cathy s came up with the idea of a bright green brat hat thanks charli xcx with ** la** embroidered on it a nice accessory for the supporters of **kamala harris for president** to wear leading up to the 2024 election i charted the ** la** for her to duplicate stitch onto her hat this graph can be used for duplicate stitching onto any hat scarf fingerless glove or other accessory that is knit at 5 sts = 1 in stockinette stitch i also designed this free hat pattern for you i was able to find this brat green yarn at **close knit yarn store** in portland the duplicate stitch is very visible on this design-- it is on the brim front and center rather than higher on the body of the hat i am sharing both the duplicate stitch chart and the free ** la** hat pattern in hopes that you will knit it wear it register to vote and then vote most importantly please consider donating to the **harris/walz** campaign you can do so here https //kamalaharris com *this pattern has not been tech-edited or test knitted * **harris/walz 2024**
